title: Vehicle financiers bet big on festive season to revive demand
description: Vehicle sales and financing in India are experiencing a slowdown due to delayed replacement demand, weak rural sentiment, and seasonal factors. Hopes are pinned on a demand recovery during the festive season. Used vehicle financing remains stable but faces competition, while top-up loans see moderation amid rising defaults and regulatory concerns.
